dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form

Interface ISelectionEventListener


  • public interface ISelectionEventListener
    An ISelectionEventListener can be used to receive selection events from widgets.

    ISelectionEventListener are either registered directly via the controller of the widget from which events should be received via AbstractWidgetController.addSelectionEventListener(ISelectionEventListener) or via the AbstractBackend.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    2009.a
